body_html: This error should be a warning. Multiple GPUs work today on Windows, and they should work with a NUMA setup (although we haven't tested this). However, the stream executor code will not take advantage of NUMA topology if it is available.

body: This error should be a warning. Multiple GPUs work today on Windows, and they should work with a NUMA setup (although we haven't tested this). However, the stream executor code will not take advantage of NUMA topology if it is available.
